transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good morning sir, Bilal ji baat kar rahe hain, Shamrita Enterprises se.
Executive: Ji, main ka baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Main aap se baat main baat kar raha hu main thoda ek meeting mein hu, theek hai?
Executive: Achha meeting mein hai sir, please aap mujhe ek baar confirm kar denge sir kab tak free rahenge kyunki aapka na ek sir hamare end pe services ke regarding ek second half second half mein karenge.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapko second half mein connect karti hu. Thank you sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to discuss services with the customer.



Resolution:

- Customer is in a meeting.

- Call will be reconnected in the second half.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will reconnect in the second half.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- services, meeting, reconnect
